statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, event_type FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE product_id = 200;
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE session_id = 300;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND event_timestamp <= '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT user_id, session_id, event_type FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE session_id = 400 AND event_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE user_id = 1234 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM user_behavior_tracking GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_events > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE product_id NOT IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, event_timestamp, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) AS avg_time_since_event FROM user_behavior_tracking;
SELECT user_id, session_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products FROM user_behavior_tracking GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY unique_products DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT(email) FROM users;
SELECT username, email, signup_date FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE signup_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT username, email, signup_date FROM users LEFT JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE activity_type = 'login'
SELECT users.username, user_activity.activity_type, user_activity.timestamp FROM users INNER JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE user_id IN (1, 4, 7)
SELECT DISTINCT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profile WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE price > 100;
SELECT user_id, product_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_products DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, count(*) as total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT u.username, p.product_name, a.activity_type FROM user_profile u JOIN user_activity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN product_catalog p ON a.product_id = p.product_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe' AND a.timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT username, email FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Product WHERE product_id > 100 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT user_id, purchase_date, product_name FROM PurchaseHistory ph JOIN Product p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id WHERE ph.user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, recommended_product_id, recommendation_date FROM Recommendation WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM User WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Product WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_product_id FROM Recommendation WHERE recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, user_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM users GROUP BY username, email HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.product_name, i.interaction_type FROM users u JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id JOIN products p ON i.product_id = p.product_id;

SELECT r.user_id, r.product_id, r.recommendation_score, u.username, p.product_name FROM recommendations r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY r.recommendation_score DESC LIMIT 5;
